text: Prawer is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: * Joshua Prawer (1917–1990), Israeli historian * Ruth Prawer Jhabvala (1927–2013), German-born British and American author and screenwriter * Siegbert Salomon Prawer (1925–2012), German-born British professor of German literature at Oxford Category:Jewish surnames Category:Germanic-language surnames
title: Prawer
